<a id="MeshInstance2D"></a>

# MeshInstance2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Node used for displaying a [Mesh](Mesh.md) in 2D.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Node used for displaying a [Mesh](Mesh.md) in 2D. A **MeshInstance2D** can be automatically created from an existing [Sprite2D](Sprite2D.md) via a tool in the editor toolbar. Select the [Sprite2D](Sprite2D.md) node, then choose **Sprite2D &gt; Convert to MeshInstance2D** at the top of the 2D editor viewport.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [2D meshes](../tutorials/2d/2d_meshes.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="MeshInstance2D_property_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Mesh](Mesh.md) **mesh** [ðŸ”—](#MeshInstance2D_property_mesh)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_mesh**\ (\ value\: [Mesh](Mesh.md)\ )
- [Mesh](Mesh.md) **get_mesh**\ (\ )

The [Mesh](Mesh.md) that will be drawn by the **MeshInstance2D**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshInstance2D_property_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **texture** [ðŸ”—](#MeshInstance2D_property_texture)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_texture**\ (\ )

The [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) that will be used if using the default [CanvasItemMaterial](CanvasItemMaterial.md). Can be accessed as ``TEXTURE`` in CanvasItem shader.
